6.5M COVID-19 cases worldwide; death toll 387,280 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741294 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/741294/6-5m-covid-19-cases-worldwide-death-toll-387-280/story/ The novel coronavirus that causes coronavirus disease (COVID-19) has killed at least 387,280 people since the outbreak first emerged in China last December, according to a tally from official sources compiled by AFP on Thursday. Police pepper spray Hong Kongers defying ban to mark Tiananmen tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741278 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/741278/police-pepper-spray-hong-kongers-defying-ban-to-mark-tiananmen/story/ Police pepper-sprayed some Hong Kong protesters on Thursday who defied a ban to stage candlelight rallies in memory of China's bloody 1989 Tiananmen Square democracy crackdown, accusing Beijing of stifling their freedoms too. Bill filed giving additional benefits to frontline health workers tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-741279 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/741279/bill-filed-giving-additional-benefits-to-frontline-health-workers/story/ House Bill 6955, or the proposed "Frontline Health Workers Welfare Act of 2020" stressed the necessity of instituting a policy to safeguard medical frontliners and their families as an act of solidarity and support to them.The measure provides that at the beginning of a pandemic or public health emergency, frontline health workers will be entitled to a one-time P5,000 allowance.
